name: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
steps: Cut potatoes into 1-inch cubes and place in a bowl with a drizzle with oil, salt, pepper, and garlic; Toss until well coated.
Transfer potatoes to a baking sheet and spread out evenly. Roast in the oven for 50 minutes while flipping occasionally, until crisp and golden.
Remove potatoes from the oven and season with extra salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle with parsley.
